item.title: Binh add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "War does not decide who is right but who is left." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Binh add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Binh add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "Reading made Don Quixote a gentleman. Believing what he read made him mad." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Binh add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Binh add a quote by Epictetus
item.description: "Τίς εἶναι θέλεις, σαυτῷ πρῶτον εἰπέ: εἶθ' οὕτως ποίει ἃ ποιεῖς. (<i>First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do</i>.)" -- Epictetus

item.title: Binh add a quote by Phan Thanh Bình
Binh add a quote by Albert Schweitzer
item.description: "Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful." -- Albert Schweitzer

item.title: Binh add a quote by Warren Buffett
item.description: "Price is what you pay. Value is what you get." -- Warren Buffett

item.title: Binh add a quote by Calvin Coolidge
item.description: "Nothing in the world can take the place of persistence. Talent will not; nothing is more common than unsuccessful men with talent. Genius will not; unrewarded genius is almost a proverb. Education will not; the world is full of educated derelicts. Persistence and determination alone are omnipotent. The slogan Press On! has solved and always will solve the problems of the human race." -- Calvin Coolidge

item.title: Binh add a quote by Anne Bryan Smollin
item.description:
"A Chinese proverb reminds us:
You cannot prevent birds of sorrow from flying over your head, but you can prevent them from building nests in your hair." -- Anne Bryan Smollin

item.title: Binh add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Weakness of attitude becomes weakness of character." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Binh add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein
